name: ANTOXA:HACHALO
description:
Antoha: nachalo is a revolution project created in PowerPoint. 

No VBA, only hyperlinks and animations. Graphic made by video pastes. 

Genre - Rail Shooter

It's revolution in simple PowerPoint games.

Game translated from Russian to English. (Google translate and Microsoft translate)

Mechanics:

System of achievements

in-game hub

3 full levels and boss in the end

Plot:

Irkutsk, Russia - the worst place in the country. You're a former operative who got kicked out of his job. You were recruited by an "anti-terrorist" organization that sends you to fight against terrorists. Now you are justice
